description.value:
A Simple metal tool for alerting others to danger or calling for help. Some use more advanced instruments to relay coded tones when other forms of communications may be compromised.

Requirements

Part of the Standard Kit of all Guardsmen. Total Weight: ~32kg, Total Cost: 185 Thrones. HB: Get it all at once acquisition at Scarce Availability

Effect: Plentiful

Notes: 5 T
description.summary: A Simple metal tool for alerting others to danger or calling for help. Some use more advanced instruments to relay coded tones when other forms of communications may be compromised.
